attributes.review:
This app not only takes forever to download but then in the agreements that you have to accept it forces you to allow them access to you call recordings, text messages, search history private or not and so much more!
It demands personal information or you are not allowed to use the app!
DO NOT GET!!
attributes.title: The Worst App Out There

attributes.review: something with the networking of this app infiltrated my internet system and COMPLETELY disabled my robodog, robocop, robo-security, AND my robowife (all bought separately, not sponsored, credit to ROBCO industries). i now have to fend 100% on my own against the zombie apocalypse. i felt protected before but now by downloading this app, i am unsafe and will most likely die very soon. mom if you’re reading this i lo
attributes.title: HATE this mf app

attributes.review: I can’t believe this was made 😡 I was petting my dog and they looked at my phone while I was on this app and bit me! Little did I know my dog was actually a raccoon. I didn’t have my glasses on so I didn’t notice I let the wrong animal inside. It wouldn’t have but me if I wasn’t on this app, I want this app gone! 😡 I’m in the hospital with rabies as I’m typing this! 😳
attributes.title: App but make it ✨one star✨

attributes.review: The app took 3 days to download!!!! And as soon as it finished my phone started to crash everytime I opened the app!! I had to restart my phone so many times just to make it work! I might have a virus in my phone just because of the crap. If I could rate this app lower I would.. This app is about as reliable as our president.
attributes.title: Horrible App!!

attributes.review: When i downloaded this app i didn’t think too much of it. But every night the app held me a gun point and made me do this ritual around a trump 2020 flag. Like a hoo ha hoo ha hoo ha ha ha. One night i refused to do it and the app took my secret army of obama 😛💕🥰✨🥴 cardboard cutouts and burned them in front of me in my own backyard. I had to sit there and watch in terror. I haven’t gotten a good nights sleep since i downloaded this app and i fear i never will.
attributes.title: ZONT ZO IT

attributes.review: Soon after I downloaded this app my fish died, I got kidnapped and attacked by paper. I think this app is cursed. Luckily I annoyed the kidnapper so much that he just turned the car around and took me back. I feel that this app is trying to scar people and make them go crazy. I WANT MY FISH BACK. I AM SCARED OF PAPER NOW!!! Please if you want to stop this don’t download this and save people from this curse.
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: This app took so long to download and has soon has it downloaded every time I tried to sign in onto the app it would not let me sign it wanted me to make a new account even though I already had a account this does not need to be taking up space on the apple store of it is not going to work.
attributes.title: Not worth my time

attributes.review: This app was not good. It took forever to download and kept crashing. With all of its poorly structured arguments. It was full of homophobic, racist and hypocritical ideas. Make America Great again? More like make America white again. Overall, very unsatisfied. The app required a phone number? Who has that so I will be going on tiktok. A much better app
attributes.title: Horrible, just horrible

attributes.review: I got this app expecting it to be outstanding considering it was for our amazing orange 🎃president 🤩🧚‍♀️✨💫, but instead it was the worst piece of trash I’ve ever downloaded. It took almost three days to download and it’s been glitching nonstop. The worst part was when trump 🎃decided to break into my house followed by his 🍊 Cheeto minions. if I could give it a zero star rating I would!!! 🥰💕💅
attributes.title: Worst app ever
